title: Single Number
description: Given a non-empty array of integers nums, every element appears twice except for one. Find that single one.
task: Find the Single number in array and output it, find out a way to solve this in linear O(N) time complexity with constant extra space.
inputFormat:
Line 1:N — the length of the nums
Line 2:nums — Array elements as integers
outputFormat: Single integer represnt the unique integer in array
constraints: Each element in the array appears twice except for one element which appears only once.
sampleInput:
// Array size

5

//array elements

4 1 2 1 2
hints: Think about the XOR (^) operator's property.
